thread.title: Forks film festival celebrates beauty, joy of outdoors
thread.title_full: Forks film festival celebrates beauty, joy of outdoors | Boston Herald

author: Moira McCarthy
title: Forks film festival celebrates beauty, joy of outdoors
text:
A fork in the road signifies that a choice must be made to take one path or the other. But in a place known as The Forks (part of Maine’s Kennebec Valley), there are lots of things to do — and you can choose as many as you’d like.
There’s white-water rafting, some of the best in the country. There’s hiking past incredible vistas. There are camping spots, rustic inns and B&Bs for those who like to enjoy the outdoors in a posh setting. There’s even an outdoor film festival.
